comments.author: jaas@kflag.net
comments.text: A lot of reftest lists use a regex to detect Windows XP. We should have a variable for it, like we have one for D2D.
comments.raw_text: A lot of reftest lists use a regex to detect Windows XP. We should have a variable for it, like we have one for D2D.
